Reviews.Title: “Couldn't be happier ...”

Reviews.Content: write reviews usually id note head reviews read prefer experience trip feel hotel negativity actually worth remember guys girls despite review friend experienced 9 days experience stayed time continue review anyway friend 22 female students uk stayed 9 days 8 nights bit apprehensive reviews ignored ahead booked hostelworldcom couldnt happier time nyc arrived 11pm ny time paid balance headed straight despite reviews staff friendly hello bye leave building speak perfect english questions eat bars etc happy help start conversation unfortunately hotels stayed private double shared bathroom 10th floor werent fussed hardly hotel anyway stay clean spacious soap extra toilet roll sink wish pictures post mind sign disturb ones outside tidied fail expect hotel clean floor towels bed etc heard noise whatsoever despite friend light sleeper bathroom clean spacious toilet shower facilities cleaned everyday cleaners bumped leave hello completely happy leave bought hotel day hotel environment lot mums staying didnt phase location hotel brilliant theres dunkin donuts corner excellent cheap breakfast theres corner shop left hotel hot food hot cold drinks sweets snacks medicine necessities corner shop 5th avenue empire building pretty view flat iron building located left 5th avenue street 28th street subway station trains run queens manhattan brooklyn vice versa definitely walking distance locations 5th ave madison square garden esb penn station mentioned earlier subway stopped locations course night bit wary country own odd weirdo hanging road honest wouldnt class honest wait bathroom free shower honest wasnt deal happened maybe twice 9 days friend decided bathroom 9th floor shower powerful nonetheless managed shower shared bathroom cant complain hotels fault people bit toilet personally wasnt heat adjustment shower water wasnt hot wasnt cold able heat shower wasnt able deal overall rating 4 guess people expecting level service interior design plaza hotel suppose depends sort person saying goes paid paid happy youre fussy somwhere cheap stay stay cheap light am giving 5 rating criteria superceded expected price paid criteria bathroom facilities yes 4 safe definitely stay recommend decided stay enjoy
